post.text: Dear Donald: You can't make America great again when you don't make things in America.

comment.author: Kyle
comment.text: I'm in for Gary Johnson share the word there is a good honorable choice for president. Share share we have a voice in America social media

replies.author: Christina
replies.text: That's nice Kyle, you must like paying taxes on everything you buy. Out of touch with real people.

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Gary Johnson only good choice for real Americans let's change America for the better
